You guys are so stupid, you don't know what diversity, equity, and inclusion actually means. They still hire qualified people. It just means it is against the law to not hire based on race, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, being a veteran, disability, pregnancy,.... The list goes on. The only ones hiring based on race and not merit is the current administration. Diversity, equity, and inclusion programs first began during the Civil Rights Movement in the early 1960s. Prior to this, systemic discrimination was deeply embedded in American society, with segregation, unequal access to education and employment, and limited legal protections for marginalized groups. It's just the new Boogie man for you racists. This is exactly what you guys want when you say make America great again. You would love for things to go back to the period.
